inclusion.criterion: Cirrhosis diagnosed by either of the following in a patient with chronic liver disease
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Liver Biopsy (b) Radiologic evidence of varices, cirrhosis or portal hypertension
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Laboratory evidence of platelet count <100,000 or AST/ALT ratio>1
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Endoscopic evidence of varices or portal gastropathy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: At least two HE episodes, one within the last year but not within the last month
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient can be on lactulose and rifaximin
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able to give written, informed consent (mini-mental status exam>25 at the time of consenting)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: TIPS, non-elective hospitalization or HE within last month
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known untreated, in-situ luminal GI cancers
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Chronic intrinsic GI diseases (ulcerative colitis, Crohn's disease or microscopic colitis, eosinophilic gastroenteritis and celiac disease)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a well-dressed and well-nourished adolescent who is alert and cooperative. The left shoulder is slightly higher than the right shoulder.
